price: 23. Y Nos somos Quienes damos la vida y la muerte y el único heredero de todo[437].
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ
footnotes: [437]  Al-lah se refiere a que solamente Él permanecerá cuando toda la creación perezca.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
